synopsis.text: Thrown into a world of secrecy and espionage, high school student Taiyo Asano finds solace only in his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. Orphaned and socially introverted, Taiyo's life takes a dramatic turn when he discovers Mutsumi's hidden identity—the heir to a powerful spy dynasty. Caught in the crosshairs of Mutsumi's overprotective brother, Kyoichiro, Taiyo must navigate through dangerous family politics to protect himself and the one person he cares for. To survive, Taiyo must take an unexpected leap of faith—marriage to Mutsumi. As a new member of the Yozakura family, Taiyo embarks on a thrilling journey to uncover the secrets of his past and become a formidable spy in his own right. In this whirlwind of love, loyalty, and high-stakes espionage, can Taiyo rise to the challenge and protect those he holds dear? Join him on this extraordinary mission and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
